Description: We are hiring a General Manager for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 10 years of experience in architectural design, drafting, detailing, coordination, and monitoring.
Minimum 5 years of experience in a managerial-level position.
Architecture/interior design background with Design Project Management and Business Development exposure.
Ability to handle Project Documents/Drawing Coordination.
Expertise in 3D Max and Photoshop.
Possess a strong visual awareness and an eye for detail, have good drawing skills, with the ability to work in applicable software.
BSc in Architecture, Civil Interior Design, or a relevant related discipline.
MMUP Certified with Grade “A”.
Nationality: Arabic or European
With a transferable visa

Preferred.Nationality: All Arab Countries; All Eastern European Countries
